short_description: chase valley environmental is a property management company based in penticton, british columbia, canada.
long_description: chase valley investments specializes in the acquisition, development and management of residential and commercial properties and sites across the okanagan valley. we are experienced property professionals, each of us dedicated to being the best in our field and constantly seeking out new and exciting opportunities. from the first ideas to the finishing touches, we take care of your project and make sure that your dream comes to life exactly as you hoped- whether you are building your own home, a place to run your business or commercial premises for a client, our dedicated team of experienced professionals are able to offer you an exceptional service and all the benefits and security that the chase valley group are committed to providing. our principle is simple; we have a dynamic, local and talented team, each specialists in their field and committed to providing the best service possible, brought together seamlessly to deliver outstanding results. we are striving to find new and different ways to provide the best possible level of service to our tenants, clients and partners.

generated_description: chase valley group is a property management and investment company based in penticton, british columbia. the company specializes in the acquisition, development, and management of both residential and commercial properties. their services include environmental consulting, ground work, demolition, and construction. chase valley group is committed to providing high-quality service and has a team of specialists dedicated to delivering outstanding results. they also offer new home construction services, ensuring that projects are completed to the highest standards.
